are_you_sure_delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this post?

disconnect_notification.message: Refresh this page to continue using Downloader for Instagram

download_more_100_warning.message: Downloading big amount of files may take much time and can falter

error403_reason_1.message: Instagram server says "Unathorized". Try to relogin to your instagram account.

error403_reason_2.message: Conflict with another extension. Turn off other extensions and try again.

errorZip.message: Error when getting Zip file. Most likely you have tried to download too many files within your Internet connection speed or computer power. Try to reduce number of files to make it work or try again in few seconds. Sometimes Instagram servers get stuck on a lot of requests.

desc.message: Extension allows to download photo and video from Instagram. Mass download of photo/video Instagram

open_new_tab_for_surfing.message: Open Instagram.com in new tab to continue surfing.

parallel_all_download_denied.message: Please wait until your current downloading in another tab is finished.

reloadPage.message: Please refresh page to activate Downloader for Instagram

scroll_page_for_download_more.message: Scroll down the page to download more files

tab_is_not_complete.message: Current tab loading is not complete

waiting_response_for_virtual_scroll.message: Don't Panic! We're waiting for respond of Instagram.com Server.
